CustomField.formula: OR ( ISBLANK(Birthdate), ISBLANK(Move_in_Date__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Gender__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Race__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Partner_Property__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Language__c)), ISNULL(Accessibility_Needs__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Name__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Phone__c), ISBLANK(Emergency_Contact_Name__c), ISBLANK(Emergency_Contact_Phone__c), ISBLANK(Service_Coordinator_Name__c), ISBLANK(Service_Coordinator_Phone__c), ISBLANK(Service_Coordinator_Email__c) )
CustomField.label: MissingRcRequiredFieldBlank
